author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Jin Jiang International Hotels rolls out Special Offer for The Golden Week HolidayTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Jin Jiang International Hotels rolls out Special Offer for The Golden Week Holiday  
With Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day approaching, Jin Jiang International Hotels has rolled out the Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day offer campaign, with prices for rooms booked between September 26th and October 11th discounted up to 20 per cent. The group’s 30+ hotels spread across 18 cities in China are participating in the campaign.
Jin Jiang International Hotels director of sales and marketing William Cai explained that customers can enjoy a 20 per cent discount off the room fee in any of the Jin Jiang hotels participating in the campaign if they book the room through Jin Jiang’s global distribution system, any third-party websites (whether located inside or outside of China), the Jin Jiang official website, Jin Jiang e-commerce, the telephone booking center, the reception desk at any of the participating hotels or Jin Jiang Hotels app, starting from September 25th. The group’s J-CLUB members can enjoy exclusive benefits including points accumulation and room upgrades as long as they book the room through official channels.
All member hotels participating in the campaign plan to roll out special food culture tourism events in the cities where they are based during Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day. In Shanghai, Jin Jiang Hua Ting Hotel & Towers, located in the busy Xujiahui commercial district, is just a short walk from Xujiahui commercial center. Shanghai Stadium as well as many well-known tourist attractions can be accessed via a short subway, bus or taxi ride. It is the hotel of choice for guests who would like to catch a local show, take in a tour or sample local Shanghainese snacks during the two holidays. During the October autumn, when the local weather is at its most seasonable, the Chinese restaurant at Jin Jiang International Hotel Urumqi serves an exquisite selection of Cantonese, Shanghainese and Xinjiang dishes. The hotel’s modern and fashionable restaurant always has a wide variety of cuisines on tap. Based in Jiangxi province’s Ganzhou, a beautiful area of China surrounded by mountains and streams, Jin Jiang International Hotel Ganzhou overlooks the green and clean Ganjiang River. The refined garden landscapes designed by Belt Collins International of Singapore and the interiors designed by Hong Kong master hotel interior designer John Chan assure a pleasant, relaxed and blissful stay for hotel guests.
During the campaign, in addition to the 20 per cent discount in the room fee, Jin Jiang International Hotels will roll out a series of food and beverage offers in addition to exciting and interesting recreational and leisure activities, in a move to meet the vacation and entertainment preferences of children and adults of different ages, assuring hotel guests of a unique and enjoyable vacation experience during the Mid-Autumn Festival and the National Day and a wonderful memory that could last a lifetime.
 
 
Source:- Jin Jiang International Hotels
